comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This one also has 'Vernon' written on the slide...I wonder whether she's connected with Vernon Sellars and Patsie/Patsy Hill...it's always difficult to tell just by comparing photos, but I don't think it's Patsie/Patsy...?maybe she was in one of their shows...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Yes that would make sense, and agreed: I don't think she looks like Patsy Hill.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] note how this one is numbered 5062...whereas the Sellars/Hill pics are numbered 4129...maybe this pic was taken on a different occasion...maybe this woman had no connection with Sellars/Hill...maybe (as you suggest) her surname was 'Vernon'...intriguing...
